trans-unit.source: Are you sure about removing these details?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure about removing these details?

trans-unit.source: No currency has been set for this module.
trans-unit.target: No currency has been set for this module.

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to accept secure payments via ERC-20 crypto tokens.
trans-unit.target: This module allows you to accept secure payments via ERC-20 crypto tokens.

trans-unit.source: If the client chooses to pay via ERC-20 crypto token, the order status will change to 'Waiting for Payment' until the payment has been successfully sent.
trans-unit.target: If the client chooses to pay via ERC-20 crypto token, the order status will change to 'Waiting for Payment' until the payment has been successfully sent.

trans-unit.source: If the customer has successfully sent the ERC-20 crypto tokens the order status will automatically be updated.
trans-unit.target: If the customer has successfully sent the ERC-20 crypto tokens the order status will automatically be updated.
